Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: "(Stands on the royal guard's shoulders) Cannot... forgive...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'Roland had the opportunity to do it because of you...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'You all require correction from the Queen!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Is this what the Earth's rebirth looks like to you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Do you think Earth will be saved if all humans submit to you?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Lee instantly understands Lucia's intent and signals the others to encircle Nat."}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'Humans are born wanting to be ruled, to be dominated...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'Only as a tightened knot will Earth be saved!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'He did it, he succeeded, and so will I!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm telling the truth! The Golden Age and everything then was destroyed by the Punishing Virus!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'This is the world you have to face...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Your Golden Vortex is also destroyed by it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nat', 3: 'I will not allow... will not allow...', 4: '1'}
